#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int ispal(const char *s){
    const char *p = s + strlen(s) - 1;
    while (s < p)
        if (*p-- != *s++)
            return 0;
 
    return 1;
}
int main(){
    int t,i;
    scanf("%d\n",&t);
    char s[100];
    while(t--){
        scanf("%s\n",s);
        if(ispal(s)){
            printf("YES\n");
        }
        else
            printf("NO\n");
      
    }
}
